citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Three deficiencies were identified during the facility IACUC inspection which took place on January 17, 2023, however,
the plan and schedule for correction was not documented. The facility must document a plan and schedule with dates for
correction of all deficiencies identified during IACUC inspections. The facility must correct this issue.
**********Correct by June 1, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Three deficiencies were identified during the facility IACUC inspection which took place on January 17, 2023, however, 
the plan and schedule for correction was not documented.   The facility must document a plan and schedule with dates for 
correction of all deficiencies identified during IACUC inspections. The facility must correct this issue.  
**********Correct by June 1, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
